meanings.definition: To write or create a book, article, or other literary work.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys authoring stories for children.
meanings.sent2: He is currently authoring a novel about adventure.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried authoring a tale about catching mice.
meanings.sent4: Her pen danced across the paper, authoring a world of magic.
meanings.sent5: Authoring a poem filled her heart with joy.

meanings.definition: The act of creating or producing written content.
meanings.sent2: His authoring of the report was thorough and detailed.
meanings.sent3: The authoring of the play brought smiles to the audience.
meanings.sent4: In the world of authoring, words are the artist's paint.
meanings.sent5: The authoring of the book was a labor of love.

meanings.definition: The process of designing or developing multimedia content.
meanings.sent1: Her authoring of the website included interactive features.
meanings.sent2: The team collaborated on authoring the video game.
meanings.sent3: Authoring the virtual reality experience was a thrilling challenge.
meanings.sent4: In the world of authoring multimedia, creativity knows no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The authoring of the app required attention to detail.
